title: Louis C.K. On His 'Louie' Hiatus: 'I Wanted The Show To Feel New Again'
teaser: The comic tells Fresh Air that after Season 3, he "aggressively forgot the show existed for a few months." Then he got back to work â€” for Louie's fourth season. Originally broadcast May 19.
